snippet: A lower court had found that the law, which limits the availability of medicinal, nonsurgical abortions, had imposed an undue burden on women.
abstract: Supreme Court lets stand decision by lower court temporarily blocking Arizona law restricting medicinal, nonsurgical abortions.
lead_paragraph: A lower court had found that the law, which limits the availability of medicinal, nonsurgical abortions, had imposed an undue burden on women.

headline.main: Supreme Court Lets Decision on Arizona Abortion Law Stand
